items.title: In AI, No Data Is Ever Cold
items.description: At the 2025 SNIA SDC Hammerspace’s David Flynn presented the concept for a Linux NFS-based Open Flash Platform that is needed for modern AI workflows.

items.title: Apple Releases iOS 18.7: Urgent iPhone Update For Users Who Don’t Want iOS 26
items.description: Alongside iOS 26, there’s another update available for those users who don’t want to make the leap: iOS 18.7.

items.title: Moving From Reactive Defense To Proactive Foresight
items.description: AI-powered predictive security shifts cyber defense from reaction to foresight, helping enterprises anticipate risks, cut alerts, and protect data.
